Title: Pattie And The Wrath of Poseidon
Director: David Alo, Eric Tosti, Jean-Francois Tosti
Actors: Casey Chase, Christophe Lemoine, Emmanuel Curtil
Plot: Brave mouse Patty lives in the heart of ancient Greece, where absolutely everything is possible. Admiring local heroes and heavenly gods, she desperately dreams of a great adventure. However, her best friend, the big and very anxious cat Sam, goes out of his way to protect her from any danger. But when Poseidon threatens to destroy their town, Patty and Sam are forced to embark on an exciting journey full of incredible places and bizarre creatures straight out of myth.
Subtitle: Azerbaijani

Title: Hitman
Writer: Michael Bronner, Adam Patterson, Declan Lawn
Actors: James Norton, Matthew Douglas, Rob Malone
Plot: Agent 47, a hitman-for-hire, is trapped in a political conspiracy when he unknowingly kills his target's lookalike. However, he is determined to uncover the truth and get out of it alive.
Subtitle: Turkish

Title: Paws of Fury: The Legend of Hank
Director: Chris Bailey, Mark Koetsier, Rob Minkoff
Writer: Ed Stone, Nate Hopper, Mel Brooks
Actors: Michael Cera, Samuel L. Jackson, Ricky Gervais
Plot: A hard-on-his-luck hound Hank (Michael Cera) finds himself in a town full of cats who need a hero to defend them from a ruthless villain's (Ricky Gervais) evil plot to wipe their village off the map. With help from a reluctant teacher (Samuel L. Jackson) to train him, our underdog must assume the role of town samurai and team up with the villagers to save the day. The only problem... cats hate dogs. Also starring Mel Brooks, George Takei, Aasif Mandvi, Gabriel Iglesias, Djimon Hounsou, Michelle Yeoh, Kylie Kuioka, and Cathy Shim, PAWS OF FURY: THE LEGEND OF HANK pounces into theatres July 15, 2022.
Subtitle: Turkish

Title: Ant Man and Quantumania
Writer: Richard Claus, Brian Cleveland, Jason Cleveland
Actors: Michelle Pfeiffer, Evangeline Lilly, Paul Rudd, Bill Murray, Jonathan Majors, Katherine Newton, Michael Douglas
Plot: About the adventures of former petty criminal Scott Lang, who became the owner of a suit that allows you to shrink and grow in size. Together with his partner Hope van Dyne, the daughter of the famous physicist and entomologist Hank Pym, who developed the Ant-Man costume, Scott once again saves the world from an impending threat.
Subtitle: Turkish

Title: Legend
Actors: Tom Hardy, Emily Browning, Taron Egerton
Plot: The true story of London's most notorious gangsters, twins Reggie and Ronnie Kray. As the brothers rise through the criminal underworld, Ronnie advances the family business with violence and intimidation while Reggie struggles to go legitimate for local girl Frances Shea. In and out of prison, Ronnie's unpredictable tendencies and the slow disintegration of Reggie's marriage threaten to bring the brothers' empire tumbling to the ground.
Subtitle: Azerbaijani

Title: Beauty and the Beast
Writer: Linda Woolverton, Brenda Chapman, Chris Sanders
Actors: Paige O'Hara, Robby Benson, Jesse Corti
Plot: Having lived a life in selfishness, young Prince Adam is cursed by a mysterious enchantress to having the appearance of a monstrous beast. His only hope is to learn to love a young woman and earn her love in return in order to redeem himself. Ten years later, his chance shows itself when a young maiden named Belle (Paige O'Hara) offers to take her ill father Maurice's (Rex Everhart's) place as his prisoner. With help from the castle's enchanted staff, Belle learns to appreciate her captor and immediately falls in love with him. Back in the village however, unscrupulous hunter Gaston (Richard White) has his own plans for Belle.
Subtitle: Turkish

Title: I Used to Be Famous
Actors: Naomi Ackie, Tom Bacon, Byron Konizi
Plot: 'I Used to be Famous' is a South London fairytale involving a culture-clash between a washed-up singer from an ex-ninties boy band and a musically talented young man with autism. Two opposite characters who transform each other's worlds through the power of music.

Title: What Will Happen To Me
Actors: Emre Altukh, Algi Eke, Yaman Tumen
Plot: Halim Pekyaman, whom the family considered disobedient as a child, does not like children. He spends his days living the life of a playboy. Once everything turns upside down when he talks about children live. Declared an enemy of children, he is kicked out of the TV channel, and he runs away to a country house in Kusadasi. His path crosses with Melek, who was abandoned by her husband and who is fighting for her life with her four children. Halim, in love with Melek, is ironically forced to look after her children. Will he be able to forget his luxurious life in Istanbul and become the head of the family?
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. 4 wins & 16 nominations total
Subtitle: Turkish
